# attributedText

**Instance Property**

A string of attributed text.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var attributedText: NSAttributedString? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You cannot change the value of this property once drawing begins for a print job. The delegate method [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionControllerDelegate/printInteractionControllerWillStartJob(_:)] is called immediately before the formatting is set for the job.

Assigning a value to this property also replaces the value in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISimpleTextPrintFormatter/text] property with the same string data, albeit without any formatting information.

## Related Documentation

- **init(attributedText:)**: Returns a simple-text print formatter initialized with attributed text.

## Getting and setting the text

- **text**: A string of plain text.
